author: sky.cactus
content: Normally it means the author isn't actively iterating on it and is seeking feedback on what will otherwise be the final version of the EIP.

author: sky.cactus
content: "Review" means they are still actively iterating with reviewers, but the EIP is fully formed and "complete" in the sense that it has all of the necessary pieces.

author: sky.cactus
content: Draft means "I have an idea but not all of the details hammered out yet".
